comments.body:
Would it better to do all the sends and then call get on each? Something like:

```scala
(0 until 10).map { i => send(...) }.foreach(_.get())
```

Or do we actually have to wait before each message is sent before sending the next one?
I think we probably just didn't want them to get batched together. Below we attempt to chop off a few of them, but I think the intent is for some of them to be left behind.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +146,150 @@    //Write 10 messages (ensure they are not batched so we can truncate in the middle below)
    (0 until 10).foreach { i =>
      producer.send(new ProducerRecord(topic, 0, s"$i".getBytes, msg)).get()
    }
